content.rendered:
The Tshwane South FET College, TSC Prospectus consists;

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • TSC admission process.

You can use the information contained within these prospectuses to find suitable courses and apply for admission to study at the Tshwane South FET College (TSC).

  • TSC Student Portal

Note: The TSC prospectus is very important especial for new applicants, it gives a more comprehensive understanding of your application.

Tshwane South FET College Prospectus 2024

TSC Prospectus has been uploaded to the official website, www.tsc.edu.za and can be downloaded in PDF format.

  • TSC PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
